title: Holly Willoughby is filming a new Christmas special with Bradley Walsh
text:
This is going to be good! (Picture: @hollywilloughby)

Bradley Walsh and Holly Willoughby will be spreading some Christmas cheer as they make wishes come true in a brand new family entertainment show.

Take Off will be aired on BBC1 and will see family favourites Bradley and Holly giving lucky studio audience members the chance to win the trip of a lifetime to Lapland.

This festive one-off special will be jam-packed with incredible surprises, a gaggle of games and much more leading up to a spectacular end of show finale.

It’s basically going to be like Surprise Surprise – but better!

The Chase host can’t wait to cheer up the nation. ‘Holly and I are going to help people have a wonderful Christmas this year and we’re going to have a right laugh whilst we do it,’ he said.

‘I can’t wait to cheer up the nation with Holly at my side. Bring. It. On’.

Holly will be leaving her sidekick Philip Schofield to film a Christmas special with Bradley – and it’s bound to be hilarious (Picture: ITV)

It’s not going to be short of laughs with Bradley around

(Picture: ITV)

The This Morning host also shared a photo of the duo as she teased that they have already started filming – and by the sounds of it she is already getting into the Christmas spirit.

She captioned the photo: ‘Spent a dreamy afternoon with this bundle of joy! First day filming for #takeoff @bbc … things are looking good @bradderswalsh … can’t wait for the next one xxx.’

She added: ‘This Christmas Brad and I are going to be on the telly, on a Saturday night, surprising the nation with Christmas gifts of all shapes and sizes. And I couldn’t be happier!

‘Christmas is without a doubt my favourite time of year. Happy Christmas everyone.’

And it’s not even Halloween yet.
